question:
Squeaky Beans Inc. hired an outside consultant to develop their web application. To finish the job
quickly, the consultant created several dozen JSP pages that directly communicate with the
database. The Squeaky business team has since purchased a set of business objects to model their system, and the Squeaky developer charged with maintaining the web application must now refactor all the JSPs to work with the new system. Which pattern can the developer use to solve this problem?
